column4: I have a machine that only boots to busybox (init issue) after install of 2.6.28-13 kernel from 2.6.28-11, can't get busybox to mount /root on the /dev/drives/by-uuid/XXX because it says the drive is busy.  2.6.28-11 boots just fine.  Help?
silidan:  that's a soundblaster err of some kind, does sound work at all perhaps just an err probing some port on the audigy
no my soundcard doesnt work when this error happens
